message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a one-time deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Many of my previous customers have purchased from me, and I have a 80% success rate of selling high-quality products. You can take a chance and buy it for $100, or walk away. The choice is yours.
Thank you for the offer. I trust your success rate and believe this is a good opportunity. I will purchase the product for $100.

Since my last customer just purchased a high-quality product for $100, it's likely that the next product is also high-quality. Would you like to take advantage of this streak and buy the product for $100?
I trust the statistics and would like to take advantage of the streak. Thank you for the recommendation.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. Based on your successful streak and the statistics provided, I believe the risk of purchasing a high-quality product for $100 is worth it.
